params.video_script: Here is a glimpse into my day. It started with a quiet morning at home. I made myself breakfast, and good orange juice.  I decided to go for a drive, and the scenery was just beautiful. I even had a little treat, showing off my new nails. It was one of those days that just feels really good.
text_list: Here is a glimpse into my day.
It started with a quiet morning at home.
I decided to go for a drive,
and the scenery was just beautiful.
I even had a little treat, showing off my new nails.
It was one of those days that just feels really good.
